“When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!”

[h1]Portal 2 is an outstanding sequel which improves every single aspect of its predecessor.[/h1]

PROs:
-hilarious (potatoe, founder, etc.)
-freakin amazing gameplay (portals, gels)
-superb voice acting (Ellen McLain, J.K. Simmons, Stephen Merchant)
-developer commentary
-long enough play time (13 hours)
-continues the HL-Universe-Story (dock beneath the earth)
-many different environments, stunning levels
-great soundtrack
-and this end, !OMG!

CONs:
-frustrating loading times
-we have to wait too long for a sequel =((

This must be my absolute favorite game, I love the game itself, but the dialogues are awesome, the hidden content makes that you can come across surprises every time you play and the inspiration it gives to so many others is utterly amazing. I don't think I'll ever become tired of this game, also because you're able to play other people's tests, and make your own. This game has no end, you can always play new things if you like. Portal 2 in my opinion is a true masterpiece!
Best game i have EVER played! The Plot is amazing and the gameplay is challenging as well as fun. 10/10

Wow. For those who played Portal and are looking forward to play this game, you will not be dissapointed. The atmosphere of the game is amazing, the start of the game is amazing, the sound is amazing, it is just such a good game, it has a perfect score for a reason. They have lovable characters, and challenging puzzles. The only thing I really dislike about it right now is when I can't figure out the puzzles. But that is the point of a puzzle, isn't it? But when you solve the puzzles, its a "aha!" instead of "UGH finally I solved it!" which was a goal for this game. I haven't beat this game yet, but I cannot wait to play the rest.


The game also has a building mode! I can't say much about the level editer, only cause I haven't really gone into it. It is a perfect game, definatly a 10/10!!


Story (so far for me): 8.5/10
Music: 8/10
Controls: 9/10
Building: 8/10
Music: 8/10

Over all, I give this a 9.5/10 (yeah I know I said a 10/10, but hey change of heart)

This is one of the most stressful, yet exciting games I've ever played. Although most of the puzzles in the game are decently solvable, there are some that may be surprisingly challenging. 

This game's story is really great in my opinion. At first it seems like a normal solve and chug kind of game, but the game becomes dark really quickly. I loved the twists and turns of Portal 2 and the fact that there is a mode where you can try and solve other people's creations.

Overall, when considering that it's a game that uses your brain, I would think it deserves a very high score.

Postal 2 is a Norwiegian JRPG made in the year chicken pie. The game is about 2 homeless dudes, Alberto Eisteino and DJ Khaleed as they travel through time and space searching for the matrix crystal, a mysterious artifact which allows the user to create infinite boiled carrots. On their way they must fight through McDonalds employees for some reason and prevent the matrix crystal from falling into the wrong hands. The game won an Oscar for best supporting role at the 2011 Dota 2 championships in Seoul. In popular culture, the game has been largely known for its use in the sport "Anime and Chill" which involves watching copius amounts of anime with a horse until you turn into an anime character.
Such a great puzzle game and funny commentary!

Portal 2 is a really good comibnation of FPS / Puzzle Game.

Second part of a really nice series of puzzle games.
And yes the Portal gun is back again only with a lot of new challanges to beat.
It's not a basic and boring puzzle game when you go to stage one until you clear the game.
Portal manage to add a really nice story mode to it so the game is fun big adventure to play.
Only between stages things happen that makes it challaging and fun to play this game and let you keep on playing.
I cleared the game / story mode around the 9 hours so it's not a really big game.
What makes it fun you can now play with your buddy co-op to do all the extra missions that complete the main sotry mode.

Portal 2 is a really good game and you need to try if you love this genre.
I give this game a 10/10.
We can see that it IS a VALVE game
I already love this game and i didn't even had the chance to play the multiplayer. The best puzzle game on steam, for sure.
